input.sentences: the bike race was about to begin .
bikers raced down the streets downtown .
helicopters followed the movements of the bikers .
they eventually would be greeted with water near the finish line .
onlookers such as this biker 's wife watched patiently .
output.sentences: I was so excited to be present for the beginning of my city's annual bike race.
It was three tight peloton formations breezing through downtown rapidly.
All racers moved with agility and the televised race was nicely shot by helicopters.
This bike race was well organized with water stands full of great people cheering and greeting racers.
I always bring my wife there as she is always so excited and waited to watch it all so patiently.
